data.title: Railway Training Institute courses offered, fee structure, application, contacts
data.meta_description: All Railway Training Institute courses are geared toward meeting the needs expressed in the workplace. Check out the list of courses and more about RTI.
data.text:
Railway Training Institute in Nairobi is among the oldest training institutions in East Africa. The institution offers multiple courses, including rail, marine transport, and logistics. All Railway Training Institute courses are approved by the relevant bodies. Do you know that the Kenya Universities and Colleges Central Placement Service (KUCCPS) now sends qualified students to this institution?

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Railway Training Institute courses: all you should know

Diploma courses offered at RTI College

Contact details

Is Railway Training Institute public or private?

How can you join the Railway Training Institute?

Where is RTI located?

Does Railways Training Institute have hostels?

What is the postal code for Railway Training Institute?

All Railway Training Institute courses are high quality and aligned with the needs expressed in the job market. The institution is known for producing competent graduates in different fields, including hospitality, logistics, rail, and marine transport.

Railway Training Institute courses: all you should know

Railway Training Institute is commonly known as RTI College. The institute offers various higher diploma, diploma (level 6), and certificate (level 5) courses, as explored below.

Advanced and higher diploma courses at RTI

Below is a list of all higher diploma courses offered at RTI.

Higher Diploma Electrical (Power) Engineering

Higher Diploma in Electronic Engineering (Engineering/Power/Telecommunication)

Higher Diploma in Telecommunication Engineering

Advanced Diploma in Logistics & Transport

Advanced Technician Diploma in Applied Electrical & Electronic Engineering

Advanced Technician Diploma in Building & Construction

Advanced Technician Diploma in Building & Construction

Diploma courses offered at RTI College

Below is a list of diploma courses offered at RTI. Note that the diploma level is equivalent to level 6 in the new competence-based curriculum by the Technical and Vocational Education and Training Curriculum Development, Assessment and Certification Council (CDACC).

NB: The institution also offers a Test Course and various professional courses.

RTI online application

The institution is yet to develop an online application portal. However, students who complete secondary school education and meet the entry requirements can apply for admission into RTI through the KUCCPS postal.

How to apply to RTI

RTI accepts hard copy applications. Here are the steps you should follow to apply for a slot in the institution. Note that the institution has intakes in January, March, June, and September.

Visit the RTI website on an internet-enabled device and download the RTI application form.

Pay a non-refundable application fee of KES1,000 via Mpesa paybill 522784 and use your name as the account number. You can also find KCB bank details on the institution's website.

Fill out the form and proofread it to ascertain all information therein is correct.

Attach the required documents to your application.

Place all your application documents in an A4 envelope and drop the envelope at the institution. Alternatively, you can send the documents via post. The RTI address you should use is :

Railway Training Institute,

PO. Box 42226- 00100,

GPO Nairobi, Kenya.

Documents to attach

Below are the documents you should attach alongside your application form.

A bank slip showing that you paid the application fee. If you paid via M-Pesa, indicate the transaction number on the application form.

Copies of your academic certificates

Leaving Certificate

Birth certificate

A copy of your national identity card

Successful applicants will receive their RTI admission letters. Those with admission letters are ready to join the institute.

Fee structure

The fees charged may vary depending on the course and level of study. Prospective students are advised to confirm the fees from the institution before applying.

If you wish to contact the institution for further information, use the contact details given below.

Email address: training@rti.ac.ke

Telephone number: +254 20 2378397

Is Railway Training Institute public or private?

RTI is a public tertiary Institution under Kenya Railways in the Ministry of Roads and Transport.

How can you join the Railway Training Institute?

You can join RTI by applying for admission into one of the courses listed above.

Where is RTI located?

Railway Training Institute is located along Mwangeka Rd in Nairobi, Kenya.

Does Railways Training Institute have hostels?

Yes, RTI has hostels for male and female students at a fee. Students who use these hostels pay an additional amount (accommodation fee).

What is the postal code for Railway Training Institute?

The postal address is Railway Training Institute, PO. Box 42226- 00100, GPO Nairobi, Kenya.

All Railway Training Institute courses are geared towards the needs expressed in the market. The institute has intakes in January, May, and September.

Tuko.co.ke recently published all the details about the Mzumbe online application process. Mzumbe University in Morogoro is a public university established in 2001.

The university offers certificates, diplomas, degrees and master's courses in different fields. Application is open to both Tanzanian and non-Tanzania nationals who would like to join the university.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
